description: The International Court of Justice (ICJ) will on Thursday pronounce its verdict on the Kulbhushan Jadhav case, government sources confirmed here.
title: ICJ to pronounce verdict on Kulbhushan Jadhav today - Times of India

description: Pakistan on Monday while presenting its case at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Kulbhushan Jadhav issue claimed that "India has used this court as the scene of political theatre."
title: At ICJ, Pakistan says India's application on Kulbhushan Jadhav is unnecessary, misconceived - Times of India

description: The International Court of Justice (ICJ) will pronounce its verdict on the Kulbhushan Jadhav case on Thursday, three days after it heard arguments presented by India and Pakistan. According to government sources, the international court will give its verdict around 3.30 pm (IST) tomorrow.
title: Kulbhushan Jadhav case: ICJ to pronounce verdict tomorrow - Times of India

author: Vidya Ram
description: International Court of Justice will decide whether to order Pakistan to temporarily halt the execution of the former Indian naval officer after what India termed a “farcical” military trial.
title: ICJ verdict on Kulbhushan Jadhav at 3.30 p.m. today
